content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Isabelle/788f11af9822 provides a component for E prover 3.0.03, for all
platforms, including arm64-linux and arm64-darwin.

It is not yet activated in Admin/components/main: I am waiting for the verdict
by Sledgehammer experts.

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
